physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Diagnosis of congenital hypothyroidism based on thyroid function analysis showing elevated TSH and low T4 levels.
Ultrasound showed thyroid structures measuring 22 mm and 19 mm on both sides of the trachea.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroid structures were found to be heterogeneous with cystic malformations in follow-up examinations.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No uptake on thyroid scintigraphy indicating further deterioration of thyroid function.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued decline in thyroid function evidenced by no uptake on scintigraphy compared to earlier assessments.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hearing test was performed and was normal.
